text: The year 2009 is the 21st year in the history of Shooto, a mixed martial arts promotion based in Japan. In 2009 Shooto held 30 events beginning with, Shooto: Shooto Tradition 5. ==Title fights== ==Events list== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="font-size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # !
